price: 9. Mise waxay yeesheen Alle ka sokow awliyo (ay caabudaan)? Allaah baase ah Waliga (Sokeeyaha iyo Gargaaraha dhabta ah), Isagaana nooleeya maytida, Isagaana wax walba Kara.
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۖ فَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡوَلِيُّ وَهُوَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūnihi awliyāa fal-lahu huwa al-waliyu wahuwa yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
